title: Received some unusual pictures from a unknown number
selftext: These are pictures I received just now from an unknown number, and they look unusual. I don't know who the kid in the picture is . Later, this person deleted the pictures and did not reply to anything.I'm just 17 years and I don't know what to do or why I even received these pictures
comments: Report to the police, just to b on the safer side

Report the number to Childline as soon as possible. 

Call childline: 1098

Probably just a wrong number. They're trying to prank you or some by creating YouTube video or shorts. 

Of course it's possible they captured rhe child and Calling the highest bidder.

Though I don't think they'd be that i competent to misscall someone.

post on x and tag police they will notice and take care of it or file complain here [Cyber Crime Portal](https://www.cybercrime.gov.in/) you do not have to go anywhere (believe me case of child abuse and kidnaping is in rise please report it  don't ignore it ) if you need other help message me
kid is smiling in one photo so i don't know what to make of any of this
Offtopic: That font on your phone is the visual equivalent of nails on a chalkboard. Typographical atrocity!
Possible child porn. Report to the police immediately.
I like it. Thatâ€™s just your opinion not an atrocity.
Dont think this child abduction, considering there is no bruising around the wrists from the chains and it is quite an open space to take a supposed child abduction photo.
